care.description: LEATHER / PATENT LEATHER / ANTIC LEATHER Wipe with a dry cotton cloth.
SUEDE / NUBUCK LEATHER / SPLIT LEATHER Clean with a soft brush or a hard sponge.
Colourless wax or wax the colour of the leather can be applied.
SUEDE / NUBUCK LEATHER Can be protected with treatment sprays or dust repellents (repellents for mops).
